Body:
for V in ('0.8.10a3', '0.8.10-a3'):
    vstr, v = parseVersion(V)
    assert v.major == 0
    assert v.minor == 8
    assert v.maint == 10
    assert v.release == 'a3'
    assert vstr == '0.8.10a3'
for V in ('0.3b14', '0.3b14.dev2', '0.3-b14.post1'):
    vstr, v = parseVersion(V)
    assert v.major == 0
    assert v.minor == 3
    assert v.maint == 0
    assert v.release == 'b14'
    assert vstr == V.replace('-', '')
vstr, v = parseVersion('1')
assert v.major == 1
assert v.minor == 0
assert v.maint == 0
assert v.release == 'final'
assert vstr == '1'
